1.title: Die Tote in der Zisterne
1.plot: Istanbul police commissioner Mehmet Özakin's former university mate Yunus, now a restaurant chain owner, asks him discretely to look for German tourist Anja Sonntag, who is later found murdered in the city's ancient cisterns. Flanked by Mustafa and Anja's best friend, unshakable German newspaper correspondent Monika Adler, Özakin investigates the case, which proves to tie in with country bakery daughter Kadriye's mysterious turning up at his home to ask help and sudden disappearance. Next to Anja's regular bathing resort hotel in Marmaris, to deputy Mustafa's delight,...

2.title: Mord am Bosporus
2.plot: Istanbul businessman Hüseyin Akdamar, who checked into a luxury hotel for sex with Ukrainian 'maid' Ludmilla Dubrynska, is fatally stabbed by a person in a burkah. Later Faruk Soydan suffers the same fate, while Ludmilla survives an attack. Commissioner Mehmet Özakin, whose wife Sevim bugs him about 'neglect', and his assistant Mustafa, whose mother bugs him with her health, investigate the victims' families, the survivor, ultra-Islamic circles the Akdamars belong to and a feminist anti-adultery-activist Fatma Colak.

3.title: In deiner Hand
3.plot: Commissioner Özakin has to postpone marital quality time after a puzzling bank robbery. The old guard, who strolled off for a snack, was shot outside, but probably not functionally for the theft, which was probably cued by the haughty US-trained female manager or her staff. Confidential client files, found in the murdered guard's home, lead to a web of family secrets. Meanwhile deputy commissioner Mustafa must contend with a woman searching for a son, 'abdcuted' by the father from Germany to Istanbul, and Muslim fasting.

4.title: Die steinernen Krieger
4.plot: Istanbul murder detective commissioner Mehmet Özakin and his deputy Mustafa Tombul investigate the murder of art gallery owner Alpay Ertem, found there skull smashed twice with a water bottle. In a nearby drain are found the smashed pieces of a priceless Byzantine era stone relief. Alpay filed for divorce from Leyla, who claims to be abused; he was likely to get custody of their two school age children, which his wealthy parents now claim. Leyla has an affair with her lawyer, Illhan Haci. The relief leads to links between the victim and someone in the Istanbul City ...

5.title: Der Preis des Lebens
5.plot: Commissioner Mehmet Özakin is almost relieved that a purse-snatcher frees him from shopping all over Istanbul with his wife. It also puts him near the spot of a car explosion which kills the driver, newspaper reporter Ismet Baydar, who was digging into real estate corruption, yet the press prefers the more spectacular, albeit unfounded terror theory. While private and professional motives are investigated and informers are disproved, one is stabbed to death on her way to the precinct: Laila Kaleci, an employee of Dr. Fatih Arman's Antalya private clinic, who met Ismet...

6.title: Blutsbande
6.plot: Contractor Baha Güngür is found murdered. His building site must be shut down if the archaeological findings there prove real evidence it was emperor Theodius's long lost Bosporus port. Istanbul commissioner Mehmet Özakin, who grudgingly hosts German exchange student Rico from his wife's faculty, however soon suspects an unrelated motive after another killing, having found in both cases a newspaper clipping referring to a German tourist's hit and run death, for which a probably innocent man went to jail and committed suicide there. His theory to the actual culprits ...

7.title: Transit
7.plot: The cases of a murdered cab driver and his last passenger, abducted Iranian political refugee Nesrin Bahrami, must be linked. Commissioner Özakin's boss forbids investigating the role of the Iranian secret service, but their muscle comes into bloody action. Key are cab company owner Erdogan Önal, also suspected of contraband trade, ans somehow his wife and daughter and soon murdered brother, party-boy Tarik.

8.title: Stummer Zeuge
8.plot: Security firm owner Hunal and his wife were shot at home. Commissioner Mehmet Özakin must find their son Ersun, initially a suspect, actually the only witness, whom he saves from a masked killer thanks to a brave buddy Mourad, later must take home for lack of trustworthy relatives until his sister arrives. The next suspect, Hunal's former friend and fired employee, leads the investigation to the Istanbul Boxing Club.

9.title: Rettet Tarlabasi
9.plot: Istanbul contractor Hakan Demirkan is found murdered in his summer house, next to a voodoo doll. Commissioner Mehmet Özakin and assistant Mustafa first examine threats against Demirkan on account of his firm's controversially drastic development projects in the old neighborhood Tarlabasi. He had an adulterous affair with the shortly after murdered opposition lawyer's girlfriend, Yasemin Gül. Demirkan's wife Hanife, politically ambitious son Züli and business partner Cihan Baysal, a speculator, hide more secrets. A crippled ex-cop now detective's son, an (ex-?)junkie, ...

10.title: Die zweite Spur
10.plot: Commissioner Özakin's team investigates the fatal stabbing with a blunt object of archaeology museum chief guard Halil Gezer, in the park. He was disliked as too strict and recently fired a former friend Koray Celik, who refused to forbid his son Sabri courting Halil's daughter Ayla. Museum director Nesrin Günes opposes the ministry's intent to 'return' the whole Egyptian collection to Cairo and failed to report many valuable pieces being missing, on account of another crime, and more is to follow.

11.title: Das Ende des Alp Atakan
11.plot: Leading Turkish costume soap star Emrah Öztürk is fatally and expertly shot at a gala event, or actually his double, as the producer admits having hired one since receiving grim threats, so either could be the intended victim. Commissioner Özakin must examine both men's colorful past, which links after all, as well as studio politics. Meanwhile the presumed shooter is arrested but released for lack of proof, and tries again.

12.title: Der Broker vom Bosporus
12.plot: Half-German Ergan Gül (36) is fatally stabbed and dumped in the Bosporus. He worked in the illegal call center section of a major Istanbul broker's firm, which used dummy companies and fake accounts to sell real estate to foreigners and Turkish former ex-pats seeking a cheap pensioner home. Ergan thus paid for his language studies. Commissioner Özakin must work out if he was killed be a cheated client, as appears, executed for dealing behind the firm's back or the victim of a more personal plot, possibly involving his teacher-lover.

13.title: Ausgespielt
13.plot: Commissioner Mehmet Özakin must interrupt his holiday, even misses a major football match, to respond stat when then bras demand Istanbul PD's 'best man' on the disappearance of German au pair Julia Bischoff, as the press an German embassy are on the case even before her corpse is fund in an alley. She worked for retired start player Erhan Senay, now co-managing the team coached by his father in law Atalay Akar. Mehmet and Mustafa' whose Internet dream date thus falls trough, investigate discrete Julia's secret night life, and her Norwegian student jobs agency ...

20.title: Tödliche Gier
20.plot: Mahmoud Erbil, manager of Dursun Kara's huge construction firm, specialized in cheap but safe apartments, dies at night, drunk, by Molotov cocktail in his car. Mahmoud's near-adult son, student Burhan, wasn't on speaking terms with him, even had an affair with his young stepmother Hamida, and belonged to a artists collective squatting a site about to be wrecked by Durkan's firm. Owner Dursun Kara, senior managers Galip Saygun and Tufan Ünsal are suspects, like a fired employee, now waitress but having accessed the HQ in the fatal night to steal data, presuming unsafe ...

21.title: Thailand 1
21.plot: Inspectors Özakin and Tombul travel to Bankok with a suspected member of a gang of human traffickers. After handing over their prisoner to Thai authorities, both inspectors are kidnapped. The prisoner's sister demands that Özakin liberates her brother - or else Tombul will die by a snake bite.

22.title: Thailand 2
22.plot: Özakin and the attorney have managed to free the prisoner. On their flight, they are ambushed. The rival Red Dragon gang kidnap the prisoner and leave Özakin bleeding in the ruined car. How can he save his colleague now?

imdb.plot outline: Istanbul police commissioner Mehmet Özakin is in charge of serious crime, mainly murder investigations, mostly in the Turkish metropolis. A very modern Turk, he uses up to date Western methods, without prejudice, assisted by bachelor Mustafa Tombul. Even his private life is progressive, his wife Sevim being on the former imperial capital's university staff.
imdb.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul
plot: Istanbul police commissioner Mehmet Özakin is in charge of serious crime, mainly murder investigations, mostly in the Turkish metropolis. A very modern Turk, he uses up to date Western methods, without prejudice, assisted by bachelor Mustafa Tombul. Even his private life is progressive, his wife Sevim being on the former imperial capital's university staff.::KGF Vissers
